page.title: 17Recreation, events
page.content: In Skirlaugh every year a gala takes place on the village playing field. There are decorated lorries and one carries the Gala Queen and two little princesses who are chosen from the girls in the village.As well as the decorated lorries there is a fancy dress and pet show. This year we are having a fun run and 450 people are taking part in it.There is a 3km run and a 10km run and any age can join in the fun.Theres an other event called Bonfire night that takes place in the field next door to the playing fields.Theres always a guy that goes on the top of the bonfire .This happens because of Guy Fawkes who planned to blow up the houses of parliament on the 5th of November 1605.
